uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.html

Class ErrorProcessingFormAction<X,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.action.FormAction
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.html.ErrorProcessingFormAction<X,K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResponseTransitionProvider.EditSectionTransition.EditAction

    public abstract class ErrorProcessingFormAction<X,K>
extends FormAction
    A FormAction that provides custom handling of a form that fails to validate. This behaviour only applies in the web-context where form submission and validation are s.
    Author:
    spb

        public FormResult processError(AppContext conn,
                      Form f,
                      TransitionFactory<K,X> provider,
                      X target,
                      K key,
                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> missing,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> errors)
        Process a form that failed to validate. The default re-display of the form can be triggered by returning a ErrorFormResult.
        Parameters:
        conn - AppContext
        f - Form
        target -
        missing - required fields with no value
        errors - map of field names to validation errors.
        Returns:
        FormResult
